properties.body:
BRAZIL-SOUTH COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY BY M/V HAWK EXPLORER TOWING
   12000 METER LONG CABLES:
   A. IN PROGRESS UNTIL 08 APR ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      32-43.82S 050-25.65W AND 27-51.82S 045-41.80W
   B. 09 AND 10 APR ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      27-59.58S 045-17.60W AND 34-40.16S 051-55.10W
   SIX MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 11 APR 13.
